20101223222724.000|20101223222726.000|TR0|HAYES:  The Kennedy era started back in 
20101223222726.000|20101223222728.000|TR0|1947, when John F. Kennedy was elected to 
20101223222728.000|20101223222730.000|TR0|the House.  JFK's two younger brothers 
20101223222730.000|20101223222732.000|TR0|followed in his footsteps; Robert Kennedy, 
20101223222732.000|20101223222735.000|TR0|as a New York senator; and from 
20101223222735.000|20101223222737.000|TR0|Massachusetts, the man who would become 
20101223222737.000|20101223222739.000|TR0|the lion of the Senate, Ted Kennedy, who 
20101223222739.000|20101223222741.000|TR0|died of brain cancer last year.
20101223222741.000|20101223222743.000|TR0|
20101223222743.000|20101223222745.000|TR0|It was his father's death, according to 
20101223222745.000|20101223222747.000|TR0|close friends, that influenced Patrick 
20101223222747.000|20101223222749.000|TR0|Kennedy's decision to leave office.
20101223222749.000|20101223222752.000|TR0|
20101223222752.000|20101223222754.000|TR0|KENNEDY:  While a nation has lost a great 
20101223222754.000|20101223222756.000|TR0|senator, my brothers and sisters and I 
20101223222756.000|20101223222758.000|TR0|have lost a loving father.
20101223222758.000|20101223222800.000|TR0|
20101223222800.000|20101223222802.000|TR0|HAYES:  Patrick Kennedy's tenure in the 
20101223222802.000|20101223222804.000|TR0|House was largely defined by personal 
20101223222804.000|20101223222806.000|TR0|struggles, including bipolar disorder and 
20101223222806.000|20101223222808.000|TR0|an addiction to painkillers, which he 
20101223222808.000|20101223222811.000|TR0|admitted to after crashing his car into a 
20101223222811.000|20101223222813.000|TR0|barricade outside the Capitol Building in 
20101223222813.000|20101223222815.000|TR0|2006.  As for policy issues, he became a 
20101223222815.000|20101223222817.000|TR0|strong critic of the Afghan war,
